wikitext.*:
'''Two Towers''' can refer to:
==Books==
* '''''[[The Two Towers]]''''', the second volume of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
*''[[The Art of The Two Towers]]''
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers Photo Guide]]''
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers Visual Companion]]''
==Adaptations==
===Films & video===
*'''''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''''', directed by [[Peter Jackson]].
*[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]
*''[[The Two Towers: The Purist Edit]]'', a [[Tolkien fandom|fan project]].
*''[[The Return of the Fellowship of the Ring to the Two Towers]]'', an episode of ''South Park''.

===Games===
*[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (video game)]], a video-game by [[Electronic Arts]].
*[[The Two Towers MUD|''The Two Towers'' MUD]]
*''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, Vol. II: The Two Towers]]''
*''[[The Two Towers Sourcebook]]'', a supplement for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying Game]]''.
*''[[The Lord of the Rings & The Two Towers]]'', a collection of video games.

===Music===
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - The Complete Recordings]]'', composed by [[Howard Shore]].
*''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]''
==Other==
*[[The Two Towers/Quotations]], noteworthy quotes from ''[[The Two Towers]]''.
